problem.markdown:
>>In the Diagram view of the Excel data model, what does a line between two tables represent?<<
( ) Data flow ( ) Duplicate information (x) Table relationship ( ) Data types
[explanation] In Excel data model's diagram view, a line represent a relation between two tables. [explanation]
problem.p: In the Diagram view of the Excel data model, what does a line between two tables represent?

choicegroup.label: In the Diagram view of the Excel data model, what does a line between two tables represent?

div.p: In Excel data model's diagram view, a line represent a relation between two tables.
